name: ST Breadcrumb
author: Beautiful-Templates.com Team

sections.description:
Simple plugin to create breadcrumb for wordpress

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the entire st-breadcrumb-wp folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place PHP code ‘< ?php echo do_shortcode( ‘[ST-breadcrumb]’ ); ? >’ to display twitter feeds in your page template.
  4. Place shortcode ‘[ST-breadcrumb]’ . Use the widget to place it in your sidebar or other areas!

If you need more support or customize. Please visit our Fee WordPress plugin – Premium WordPress Theme
sections.installation:
Step 1: Upload the entire plugin directory.
Step 2: Activate the plugin through the Plugin manager in WordPress.

You will find ST Breadcrumbs Wp in Admin -> Settings

short_description: This is a plugin which lets you create Breadcrumbs for Pages!
